title: पश्चिम बंगाल में भगवा झंडा फहराने पर हिंदू युवक की पिटाई? झूठे दावे से UP का वीडियो वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
This is the position of Hindus in West Bengal. This Hindu boy hoisted saffron flag atop his house. Forwarded by LT Col Dilip Kumar Havanur.

Posted by Rajesh Jain on Wednesday, May 15, 2019
